contoller

Class ParameterViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • contoller.ParameterViewController

  • public class ParameterViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class interact with the model when notified by the ParameterView. It maintains a cache during its existence to keep track of the changes to push to the model when the user presses the "ok" button in the view. It does not directly update the model in order to revert in the cases where the user presses the "cancel" button.

    • Constructor Summary

      Initialize the controller

      • saveDefault

        public void saveDefault()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
